name: MovieMage
0:
”Alexa, ask Movie Mage what fantasy movie should I watch next?”
”What is a good science fiction movie?”
”Give me some action movie recommendations.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie mage
des: From chick flicks to indie pictures, Movie Mage has got it all! With over 600 of the greatest acclaimed movies sorted by genre, you'll always have a new movie to watch. Get that screen going!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
